titles.title: HUD Manufactured Housing Modernization Act of 2019
HUD Manufactured Housing Modernization Act of 2019

A bill to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to issue guidelines relating to the appropriate inclusion of residential manufactured homes in Consolidated Plans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 116-125.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary:
HUD Manufactured Housing Modernization Act of 2019
This bill requires the Department of Housing and Urban Development to issue guidelines for jurisdictions regarding the inclusion of residential manufactured homes in a jurisdiction's housing affordability strategy and community development plan.
